basics.name: Yosr Jadly
basics.title: Full Stack JavaScript Developer
basics.summary: Passionate and creative full-stack JavaScript developer with a user-centric mindset and a strong foundation in the MERN stack. I thrive on building impactful, responsive, and functional web and mobile applications that solve real-world problems.

bio.short: I'm a full-stack developer building scalable and creative web/mobile apps with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
bio.long:
As a passionate full-stack JavaScript developer, I specialize in building interactive applications using the MERN stack, React Native, and Next.js. I'm driven by problem-solving, efficient debugging, and delivering user-friendly digital solutions. I've led and collaborated on various projects such as medical dashboards, artist platforms, real estate platforms, and educational communities. I value clean code, clear logic, and collaborative growth.

Previously a community leader at Microsoft Engineering Community, I enjoy empowering others, continuous learning, and making tech more accessible. Fluent in Arabic, English, and French, I aim to create technology that resonates globally and functions elegantly.

education.institution: Higher School of Sciences and Technology of Hammam Sousse (ESSTHS)
education.degree: Licence of Science in Mathematics and Computer Science
education.description: Focused on problem-solving, algorithms, and full-stack web development. Participated in student communities and built impactful student-focused platforms.
Graduated with strong foundations in analytical thinking and mathematical reasoning, setting the stage for a technical career in software development.

experience.description: Led community events and workshops, mentoring junior developers and organizing technical activities focused on web development and problem-solving.

Building and maintaining full-stack web and mobile applications for local businesses and initiatives. Projects include medical dashboards, artist portfolios, real estate listing tools, and gym platforms.

testimonials.name: Sami Ben Ali
testimonials.text: Yosr has a rare blend of creativity, precision, and determination. Her ability to pick up new tools quickly and turn ideas into reality is impressive.

testimonials.name: Lina Mahjoub
testimonials.text: Yosr's leadership in the Microsoft Engineering Community helped drive impactful engagement and real learning. She is proactive, skilled, and reliable.
